daily_message.1: OOF! It isn't looking too good for you today. Stay positive and remember that tomorrow is a new day!

quotes.1: Work until your bank account looks like a phone number.
quotes.2: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit story you keep telling yourself as to why you can’t achieve it.
quotes.3: It’s business. Leave your emotions at the door.
quotes.4: 97% of the people who quit too soon are employed by the 3% who didn’t.
quotes.5: Hard work beats talent. Every time!
quotes.6: I want you to deal with your problems by becoming rich!
quotes.7: You wanna know what money sounds like? Go to a trading floor on Wall Street.
quotes.8: The real question is this: was all this legal? Absolutely f**king not. But we were making more money than we knew what do with.

3.message: While not out to get you, you may lack common ground as a wolf.
